sentences.en: America's Treasury asks Congress for $ 700 billion to stabilise the markets.
sentences.cn: 美国财政部请求国会拨款7000亿美元以稳定市场.

sentences.en: As the plane was tossed up and down, the pilot tried to stabilise it.
sentences.cn: 飞机上下颠簸，飞行员试图将其稳住。

sentences.en: But these will not stabilise levels of atmospheric carbon dioxide — only slow the rate of increase.
sentences.cn: 但是这无法稳定大气中的二氧化碳水平——而只能降低增加的速率。

sentences.en: Do all this and the economy will stabilise next year.
sentences.cn: 这一切做了之后,明年经济将稳定运行.

sentences.en: Earlier two holes were blasted into the ship's hull to let water out and stabilise the ferry.
sentences.cn: 之前在船体上炸出了两个洞，以便把水排出，使船平稳下来。

sentences.en: Even if house prices stabilise soon, non - mortgage credit will go on deteriorating as the economy shrinks.
sentences.cn: 即使房价很快企稳, 非 抵押信贷会随着经济下滑而连续恶化.

sentences.en: Helps to stabilise mood swings, prevent ageing skin and reduce freckles.
sentences.cn: 稳定情绪, 展延肌肤老化和淡化或减少雀斑.

sentences.en: However, after three weeks of cold exposure, body weight began to stabilise.
sentences.cn: 不过，暴露在寒冷中三周后，体重就开始稳定下来。

sentences.en: I therefore believe that it is now necessary and desirable for property prices to stabilise.
sentences.cn: 因此,我认为楼价现在需要稳定下来.

sentences.en: If so, the trade surplus should stabilise in coming months.
sentences.cn: 如果是这样的话, 贸易顺差将在下个月趋于稳定.

sentences.en: Only small quantities are required to stabilise the pigments without flocculation.
sentences.cn: 只需要少量的分散剂就可以稳定颜料而不产生絮凝.

sentences.en: Second, stabilise bank capital and funding.
sentences.cn: 其次, 要夯实银行资本和资金.

sentences.en: That should help stabilise their stock prices.
sentences.cn: 这将有助于稳定他们的股票价格.

sentences.en: The effect should be to stabilise markets.
sentences.cn: 且这一效应应能稳定市场.

sentences.en: The end of ploughing helps stabilise the soil, while stopping irrigation alleviates water shortages.
sentences.cn: 结束耕作有助于稳定土壤, 而停止灌溉则有利于缓解水资源短缺问题.

sentences.en: The increased investment will help stabilise the economy.
sentences.cn: 增加的投资将有助于经济的稳定。

sentences.en: These efforts helped stabilise the money markets last week.
sentences.cn: 这些努力上周帮助货币市场走向平稳.

words.tran_cn: [助剂] 稳定剂；稳定器；安定装置
